scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend/project --include=dev && npm run build --prefix frontend/project
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distPath = path.join(__dirname, 'frontend', 'project', 'dist'); if (fs.existsSync(distPath)) { fs.rmSync(distPath, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('âœ“ Cleaned old build'); }"
